title.value: Пайка при ремонте и изготовлении деталей из алюминиевых сплавов
Brazing in the process of repairing and manufacturing of aluminum alloy
Brazing in the process of repairing and manufacturing of aluminum alloy

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Sokol, V.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Modern constructions of agricultural equipment contain aluminum alloys, susceptible to the action of destabilizing factors – vibration and buffing load declining reliability of equipment parts, leading to destruction of elements and breakdown of the devices. Therefore creation of the constructions with determined strength level appears a necessary factor of equipment engineering. The main goal of the presented research is the development of the technology of brazing of aluminum alloys providing constructive durability of brazing seams, interface integrity, working ability within high and low temperatures. The method, suggested in the article supposes brazing with creation of soldering alloy, appearing the result of connection of materials, intermediate layers and gasket seals with eutectic glass formation. Main advantages of application of high-temperature brazing of the details made of aluminum alloys are analyzed; efficiency of its use in the process of maintenance and repair of equipment details is outlined.
